MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 3:40AM. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:41am on 19th December
